Medium: 24 lift ground aquatints (including wrapper front and variant print), most with aquatint, engraving, soft ground etching and/or drypoint: 23 printed in color and 1 printed in black, with pastel additions; and 1 etching (table of plates), printed in black
Dimensions:
irreg. page  15 3/16 x 11 7/16" (38 x 29 cm)
Prints:  various dimensions.
CreditLine: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Peter A. Rübel
